content_summary: Article covering Anthropic's introduction of 'programmatic tool calling' (code mode) with Claude Sonnet 4.6, claiming it replaces traditional JSON-based tool calling. Cites token usage reduction of up to 98% and accuracy improvements. Companies like Cloudflare and Anthropic already implementing. Author frames as potentially the most important under-the-radar upgrade of the year for AI agent builders.
